articles.title: Netrix 1.0.4 Released!
articles.excerpt: Manage your mods and stay updated - Netrix 1.0.4 is here.
articles.content:
Netrix 1.0.4 is now live! This custom launcher and mod manager is your all-in-one hub for the CrashCraft network and the upcoming modded server.

With Netrix, you can:
- Keep your modpack up to date
- Get server status updates
- View news and announcements

This release brings key improvements and sets the stage for launch day.

**Stay connected with Netrix.**
articles.author: Netrix Team
